html:
1.1.19  6:20 pm   should i major in music or am i just gonna suffer 

     hopefully neither

1.1.19  6:07 pm   why do you have two keyboards?

     i have at least 3 but i use them for music. and another one i use for typing / computing

1.1.19  6:01 pm   When do you upload?

     tuesday

1.1.19  5:56 pm   What my new song should be called?

     My Song

1.1.19  5:54 pm   so i want to do stuff but at the same time i don't have the drive to do the stuff i want to do, what do you think i should do?

     don't do the stuff

1.1.19  5:48 pm   what is the strongest power?

     the power of love

1.1.19  5:48 pm   Do you know how big the live band will be or who will be in it? 

     anywhere from 3 to 13 people. i don't know the players but i know the general instrumentation

1.1.19  5:45 pm   Why go to the castle?

     it is recommended for you, based on your likes and interests

1.1.19  5:43 pm   do you like what you're working on

     if i don't i should

1.1.19  5:28 pm   How do you feel about feelings?

     pretty good

1.1.19  5:27 pm   was the ball and stick in any way based off of the patreon logo

     no

1.1.19  5:27 pm   what do you think of astrology?

     seems legit

     and if you don't believe in it, why not? 

     could have been explained wrong

1.1.19  5:23 pm   Do you think that we're in some kind of simulation and being controlled? 

     what would it be a simulation of

1.1.19  5:20 pm   In "ball & stick", most of the little song bits sound like they could very well be made into full tracks. Is ball & stick like a sort of song dump or just another anything video?

     it's a video

1.1.19  5:17 pm   why did the ball go to the castle?

     it was strongly suggested

1.1.19  5:12 pm   So what was your new year's resolution?

     to start writing 2019 instead of 2018 for the date

1.1.19  5:09 pm   Oooh, is that some harpsichord in Hallelujah?

     i've used it on almost everything since 2012, but i am trying to cut back

1.1.19  3:43 pm   Do you ever get any submissions here of people saying that they "miss the old bill wurtz"? Or have you not gotten to that point yet?

     i've been getting that all my life. luckily for them i am getting older

1.1.19  3:43 pm   Why your songs are so addicting?

     to keep you coming back for more

1.1.19  3:35 pm   Do you like nature?

     it's ok

1.1.19  1:19 pm   How do you manage to stay creative?

     it's contagious, the world over

1.1.19  12:47 pm   What is, in your opinion, the strangest video idea you have thought about? 

      every time i think of a strange one i realize it's not very strange

1.1.19  12:08 pm   Why is your jazz ensemble "fake" 

     2 reasons: it's all 1 person so it's not all played together live. the other reason i use the word 'fake' is because it harkens to those jazz 'fake books' (the most famous example of a fake book is the Real Book) which has a bunch of casually written charts for popular songs / standards. and it's like when you get all the boys together and open up the book and jam on some tunes you may never have heard before. that's the same type of exercise going on on the jazz section of this site, except all the boys happen to be me

1.1.19  6:21 am   Does fame feel weird?

     i'm not sure

1.1.19  5:44 am   what do you think would happen if you locked yourself somewhere and took a whole year to write and record only 12 songs

     i would probably doubt them to pieces

1.1.19  4:42 am   what do u think about all the craziness?

     it's good

1.1.19  4:26 am   How is the sky a potato

     they are the same shape

1.1.19  3:31 am   Why do the years come to an end?

     they don't, they flow continuously

1.1.19  2:59 am   how do i be more efficient at editing?

      there are unlimited ways. the best way to find those ways is to get yourself in an impossible situation where you absolutely have to finish it sooner than you thought possible

1.1.19  2:47 am   Do you have fun making your music and videos?

     if i don't i should

1.1.19  2:08 am   what do you want your songs to mean to your audience?

     something good, preferably

1.1.19  2:03 am   It's 2019! How will you celebrate?

     make a lot of songs and other types of videos, and more

1.1.19  1:56 am   Did you get a new camera?

     no but i should

1.1.19  1:49 am   it is 2019, which is very much similar to 2018 in that I am eager to hear the next bill wurtz track. To you, is 2019 different from 2018 in any important way?

     all of time has significant similarities, and differences

1.1.19  1:47 am   harry styles ???

     no this is bill

1.1.19  1:18 am   What are your thoughts/opinions on surreal memes?

     not surreal enough, but it's a good start i guess

1.1.19  1:17 am   when you're figuring out chords as you write a song, do you take notice to the actual chords or do you kind of just play the notes that would sound good as realise afterwards like "oh that's a C#maj7/B" ?

      if i have a name for it then i know it when i play it. if i don't have a name for it, i still know it when i play it, just namelessly

1.1.19  12:37 am   Did you have a happy new year?

     every year is full of mixed feelings





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

12.31.18  11:56 pm   what are you doing on jan 1 aka the most interesting day of the year

     a surprise

12.31.18  11:37 pm   "fell down the rabbit hole then fell into it again so i guess the first time i didn't really fall in but the second time i am pretty sure i did"
do you mind talking about this a little more

     from what i can tell, that was an answer i gave to the question 'what is your life story'

12.31.18  10:37 pm   is the grass greener on your side

     it depends which side you are on

12.31.18  9:52 pm   When did you realise that music was something you wanted to pursue?

      i don't remember

12.31.18  7:18 pm   Are you gonna add more to your reality page ¿

     yes

12.31.18  5:23 pm   who invented music?

      music is the inventor, not the inventee

12.31.18  5:02 pm   What's your favorite breed of cat

     what's the one where they get to marry for love

12.31.18  4:55 pm   is the next song going to be an original one or a cover? i'm asking you this because you said that you'd start doing covers in january 2019.

     that's true, and i would like to start now, but it turns out cover song videos are much more of a legal grey area than i had anticipated. but it may be a good excuse to do a live band

12.31.18  4:32 pm   whats the best advice

      make sure you give very good advice

12.31.18  2:03 pm   ever dream yourself?

     yes

12.31.18  12:40 pm   are the invisible r's, m's, and p's on your anagram page for the date requested, made, and posted respectively?

     yes

12.31.18  9:48 am   why does the sun revolve around the earth in your new video?

     because the earth was positioned in the center
